name: aZen
description: aZen is the AI-native infrastructure for AI-agents, computing nodes and dAPPS with an in-built AI-native Protocol powered by aZen nativeâ€™s DePIN. aZen creates a new computing paradigm by transforming computing power into unified assets and integrating it across a universal infrastructure for Ubiquitous AI. aZen product suite consists of: aZen Protocol, the AI-Optimized computing scheduling and orchestration coordination layer. aZen DePIN, the computational infrastructure that powers aZen Protocol with inbuilt components such as Decentralized AI Computing Grid, Tokenized Computing Resources and native Proof of Contribution (PoC) Mechanism aZen HUB APP: Gateway APP available on Play Store and Apple Store that allows aZeners to engage with aZen Ecosystem via SocialFi and DeFAI activities. ZenHive a commercial-grade DePIN device that integrates Edge Computing, CDN, and Decentralized Storage to transform location-based data analytics and AI inferencing from the cloud to DePIN.
